Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a new energy technology that has the advantages of low emissions and high efficiency.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: However, oscillation and propagation often occur during the power generation of the system, which causes system performance degradation and reduced service life.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: To determine the root cause of multi-loop oscillation in an SOFC system, a data-driven diagnostic method is proposed in this paper.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: In our method, kernel principal component analysis (KPCA) and transfer entropy were applied to the system oscillation fault location.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: First, based on the KPCA method and the Oscillation Significance Index (OSI) of the system process variable, the process variables that were most affected by the oscillations were selected.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: Then, transfer entropy was used to quantitatively analyze the causal relationship between the oscillation variables and the oscillation propagation path, which determined the root cause of the oscillation.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: Finally, Granger causality (GC) analysis was used to verify the correctness of our method.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven

Sentencas: The experimental results show that the proposed method can accurately and effectively locate the root cause of the SOFC system's oscillation.
Titulo: Source Diagnosis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System Oscillation Based on Data Driven
